titleStmt.title: The argument against a standing army, discuss'd by a true lover of his country.
Argument shewing that a standing army is inconsistent with a free government
titleStmt.author: Trenchard, John, 1662-1723.
Moyle, Walter, 1672-1721.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and sold by E. Whitlock ...,

notesStmt.note: Written by J. Trenchard, assisted by W. Moyle. Cf. BM (1956-65).
Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
